short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protects users' privacy by blocking tracking and malware domains.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The StealthSurf extension is designed to protect users' privacy by blocking tracking and malware domains. It uses a combination of techniques to achieve this, including the declarativeNetRequest API, which allows the extension to block specific domains, and machine learning algorithms, which are used to detect and block tracking attempts.

The extension is easy to use, with a simple and intuitive interface. Just install it and it will start working in the background, protecting your privacy as you browse the web.

Overall, the StealthSurf extension is a powerful tool for anyone who values their privacy and wants to protect themselves from tracking and malware on the web. Whether you're a casual web surfer or a more advanced user, this extension has something to offer.
